text: John Roger Roberts, Baron Roberts of Llandudno (born 23 October 1935), is a Welsh Liberal Democrat politician, Methodist minister, and life peer. He was for many years President of the Welsh Liberals, and later, the Welsh Liberal Democrats. In 2004, he became a member of the House of Lords.Lord Roberts of Llandudno profile at the site of Liberal Democrats ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh politicians
title: Roger Roberts, Baron Roberts of Llandudno
